posts.title: A Hot Dog is a Sandwich
posts.author: Jane Doe
posts.text: A hot dog is a sandwich because it is a filling surrounded by two pieces of bread.

posts.title: Careers That Don't Require Pants
posts.author: John Doe
posts.text: If you are a programmer or a stay-at-home mom, you might not have to wear pants.

posts.title: Couch Size
posts.author: Jamie Doe
posts.text: It doesn't matter, your roommate, friend, lover, spouse, child, or pet will always be on your side.
